name: iata-code-decoder
title: IATA Code Decoder
description: Decodes IATA codes, helping you to identify airports, airlines and aircraft
author: timrogers

commands.name: airports
commands.title: Decode IATA Airport Code
commands.description: Identifies IATA airport codes (for example `SFO` refers to San Francisco International Airport)

commands.name: airlines
commands.title: Decode IATA Airline Code
commands.description: Identifies IATA airline codes (for example `B6` refers to jetBlue)

commands.name: aircraft
commands.title: Decode IATA Aircraft Code
commands.description: Identifies IATA aircraft codes (for example `738` refers to the Boeing 737-800)
